  • Method Details

    • requestHealing

      String requestHealing(Trainer trainer)
      Request healing for a trainer's Pokémon.
      Parameters:
      trainer - : The trainer who requests the healing.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the healing.

    • requestPotionPurchase

      String requestPotionPurchase(Trainer trainer, int amount)
      Requests the purchase of potions from a trainer.
      Parameters:
      trainer - : The trainer who requests the purchase.
      amount - : The amount of potions to purchase.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the purchase.

    • requestInfo

      String requestInfo(Trainer trainer)
      Provides general information to the coach.
      Parameters:
      trainer - The coach who requests the information.
      Returns:
      An informative message.

    • requestTeamManagement

      String requestTeamManagement(Trainer trainer, Pokemon pokemon, boolean add)
      Manage your trainer's team on PC by adding or removing Pokémon.
      Parameters:
      trainer - : The trainer who requests management of the team.
      pokemon - : The Pokémon to be stored or retrieved.
      add - : If true, the Pokémon is stored; if false, it is retrieved.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the operation.

    • requestPokemonTrade

      String requestPokemonTrade(Trainer trainer1, Pokemon pokemon1, Trainer trainer2, Pokemon pokemon2)
      Performs the exchange of Pokémon between two trainers.
      Parameters:
      trainer1 - : The first coach to participate in the exchange.
      pokemon1 - : The Pokémon that the first trainer provides.
      trainer2 - : The second coach to participate in the exchange.
      pokemon2 - : The Pokémon that the second trainer provides.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the exchange.
